content: it s time for a lollygag we ve paired a solid and shading yarn for this one it s a cowl knit in the round like a tube and grafted this texture is created with a fun picked-up stitch main color and contrasting colors are switched halfway through to use as much of your yarn as possible would be beautiful with a variegated and solid too if you have a kit from the shop please check your pattern there is a mistake section 1 round 12 should be worked with the mc not the cc gosh designing patterns is hard we have one more mistake we just updated the pattern 11/14 round 5 should end with 2 stitches not 1 sorry
